author: Corinne Abrams
title: Walmart Seeking $15 Billion Stake in Indian E-Commerce Giant Flipkart
text:
MUMBAI—Walmart Inc.’s battle with Amazon.com Inc. is heading to India.
Walmart is near a deal to invest around $15 billion for a roughly 75% stake in Flipkart Group, India’s largest e-commerce company, according to a person familiar with the matter. It would be a big bet by Walmart that India will be a source of growth at a time when Amazon is gaining ground in the country.
Flipkart,...
